trans-unit.source: The chef-client may be run in audit-mode. Use audit-mode to evaluate custom rules—also referred to as audits—that are defined in recipes. audit-mode may be run in the following ways:

trans-unit.source: The chef-client may need to be run with elevated privileges in order to get a recipe to converge correctly. On UNIX and UNIX-like operating systems this can be done by running the command as root. On Microsoft Windows this can be done by running the command prompt as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: chef-client可能需要以高权限运行,以获得正确的配方。在UNIX和类似UNIX的操作系统上,这可以通过以root身份运行命令来实现。在Microsoft Windows上,可以以管理员身份在命令提示符下运行。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client may now be used to configure nodes that are running on the AIX platform, versions 6.1 (TL6 or higher, recommended) and 7.1 (TL0 SP3 or higher, recommended). The service resource supports starting, stopping, and restarting services that are managed by System Resource Controller (SRC), as well as managing all service states with BSD-based init systems.
trans-unit.target: 现在，chef-client可以用于配置在AIX平台6.1版（建议使用TL6或更高版本）和7.1版（建议使用TL0 SP3或更高版本）上运行的节点。该服务资源支持启动，停止和重新启动由系统资源控制器（SRC），以及管理所有的服务状态与基于BSD的init系统管理服务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client mode in which the Data Collector will be enabled. Possible values: :solo, :client, or :both. The :solo value is used for Chef operating in Chef Solo Mode or Chef Solo Legacy Mode. Default value: both.
trans-unit.target: 启用数据收集器的Chef-Client模式。可能的值：： :solo ， :client 或 :both 。的 :solo 值用于在厨师独奏模式或厨师独奏传统模式操作厨师。默认值： both 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client must be run as a service for it to be able to regularly check in with the Chef server. Select the Chef Client Service option to have the MSI configure the chef-client as a service.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client必须作为服务运行，以便能够定期通过Chef服务器签入。选择Chef Client Service选项，以使MSI将Chef-Client配置为服务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client processes recipes in two phases:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端处理食谱分为两个阶段。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client pulls down the node object from the Chef server. If this is the first chef-client run for the node, there will not be a node object to pull down from the Chef server. After the node object is pulled down from the Chef server, the chef-client rebuilds the node object. If this is the first chef-client run for the node, the rebuilt node object will contain only the default run-list. For any subsequent chef-client run, the rebuilt node object will also contain the run-list from the previous chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: chef客戶端從Chef伺服器拉下節點物件。如果這是第一次為節點執行 chef-client,將不會有節點物件從 Chef 伺服器拉下。从Chef服务器拉下节点对象后,chef客户端重建节点对象。如果这是第一次 chef 客户端运行该节点,重建的节点对象将只包含默认的运行列表。對於任何後續的 chef-client 運行,重建的節點物件也會包含前一個 chef-client 運行的 run-list。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client pushes the node object to the Chef server at the end of the chef-client run; the updated node object on the Chef server is then indexed for search and is stored until the next chef-client run
trans-unit.target: 在厨师客户端运行结束时,厨师客户端会将节点对象推送到Chef服务器上;然后,Chef服务器上更新的节点对象会被索引以用于搜索,并被存储到下一次厨师客户端运行时。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client ran the first resource before the breakpoint (file[/tmp/before-breakpoint]), but then stopped after execution. The chef-client attempted to name the breakpoint after its position in the source file, but the chef-client was confused because the resource was entered interactively. From here, chef-shell can resume the chef-client run:
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端在断点（ file[/tmp/before-breakpoint] ）之前运行了第一个资源，但是在执行后就停止了。Chef客户端尝试以断点在源文件中的位置命名，但是由于资源是交互式输入的，chef客户端感到困惑。从这里，chef-shell可以恢复chef-client运行：

trans-unit.target: 厨师客户从菜谱中删除了一个文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client run proceeds, using HTTPS (port 443), and registers the node with the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端使用HTTPS(443端口)继续运行,并将节点注册到Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded node data from the Chef server. Default and override attributes for roles have been computed, but are not yet applied.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端成功从Chef服务器加载节点数据。角色的默认属性和覆盖属性已经计算出来,但还没有应用。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named attribute file.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的属性文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named custom resource.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的自定义资源。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named definition.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载了命名的定义。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named library file.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载命名的库文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully loaded the named recipe.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功加载了命名的菜谱。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client successfully pulled down the cookbook collection from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功地从Chef服务器上调取了烹饪书集。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client supports reading multiple configuration files by putting them inside a .d configuration directory. For example: /etc/chef/client.d. All files that end in .rb in the .d directory are loaded; other non-.rb files are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端通过将多个配置文件放在 .d 配置目录中来支持读取它们。例如： /etc/chef/client.d 。所有文件，在年底 .rb 在 .d 目录加载; 其他非 .rb 文件将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client updated the named file in the named cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端更新了命名菜谱中的命名文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Erubis for templates, which is a fast, secure, and extensible implementation of embedded Ruby. Erubis should be familiar to members of the Ruby on Rails, Merb, or Puppet communities. For more information about Erubis, see: http://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将Erubis用于模板，这是嵌入式Ruby的快速，安全和可扩展的实现。Ruby on Rails，Merb或Puppet社区的成员应该熟悉Erubis。有关Erubis的更多信息，请参见：http ://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/ 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. A reasonable set of resources are available to the chef-client, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端使用Ruby作为参考语言来创建食谱和定义食谱,并为特定资源提供扩展的DSL。一套合理的资源可供厨师客户端使用,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;然而,当需要额外的资源和能力时,这个DSL也可以扩展。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. The chef-client provides a reasonable set of resources, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用Ruby作为创建食谱和定义食谱的参考语言,并为特定资源提供了扩展的DSL。chef-client提供了一套合理的资源,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;然而,当需要额外的资源和功能时,这个DSL也可以扩展。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses a cache file to keep track of the order in which each revision of an application is deployed. By default, the cache file is located at /var/chef/cache/revision-deploys/APPNAME/. To force a re-deploy, delete the deployment directory or delete the cache file.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端使用缓存文件来跟踪应用程序每个修订版本的部署顺序。默认情况下，缓存文件位于 /var/chef/cache/revision-deploys/APPNAME/ 。要强制重新部署，请删除部署目录或删除缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses a lock file to ensure that only one chef-client run is in progress at any time. A lock file is created at the start of the chef-client run and is deleted at the end of the chef-client run. A new chef-client run looks for the presence of a lock file and, if present, will wait for that lock file to be deleted. The location of the lock file can vary by platform.
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用一个锁文件来确保任何时候只有一个chef-client运行在进行中。锁定文件在厨师客户端运行开始时创建,在厨师客户端运行结束时删除。新的 chef-client 运行会寻找锁文件的存在,如果存在,会等待锁文件被删除。锁定文件的位置会因平台而异。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses six types of attributes to determine the value that is applied to a node during the chef-client run. In addition, the chef-client sources attribute values from up to five locations. The combination of attribute types and sources allows for up to 15 different competing values to be available to the chef-client during the chef-client run:
trans-unit.target: chef-client使用六种类型的属性来决定在chef-client运行期间应用到节点的值。此外,chef-client还从最多五个地方获取属性值。属性类型和来源的组合允许厨师客户端在运行厨师客户端时有多达15种不同的竞争值。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client uses the EN_US (UTF-8) character set. By default, the AIX base operating system does not include the EN_US (UTF-8) character set and it must be installed prior to installing the chef-client. The EN_US (UTF-8) character set may be installed from the first disc in the AIX media or may be copied from /installp/ppc/*EN_US* to a location on the logical partition (LPAR). This topic assumes this location to be /tmp/rte.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端使用EN_US（UTF-8）字符集。缺省情况下，AIX基本操作系统不包括EN_US（UTF-8）字符集，并且必须在安装Chef-client之前安装它。 EN_US（UTF-8）字符集可以从AIX介质中的第一张光盘安装，也可以从 /installp/ppc/*EN_US* 复制到逻辑分区（LPAR）上的某个位置。本主题假定此位置为 /tmp/rte 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client version 12.4 release adds an optional feature to the Microsoft Installer Package (MSI) for Chef. This feature enables the ability to pass quoted strings from the Windows PowerShell command line without the need for triple single quotes (''' '''). This feature installs a Windows PowerShell module (typically in C:\opscode\chef\modules) that is also appended to the PSModulePath environment variable. This feature is not enabled by default. To activate this feature, run the following command from within Windows PowerShell:
trans-unit.target: Chef-Client版本12.4发行版为Chef的Microsoft安装程序包（MSI）添加了可选功能。此功能使您能够从Windows PowerShell命令行传递带引号的字符串，而无需使用三重单引号（ ''' ''' ）。此功能将安装Windows PowerShell模块（通常在 C:\opscode\chef\modules ），该模块也附加到 PSModulePath 环境变量中。默认情况下不启用此功能。要激活此功能，请在Windows PowerShell中运行以下命令：

trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端无法加载命名的自定义资源。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will determine the correct provider based on configuration data collected by Ohai at the start of the chef-client run. This configuration data is then mapped to a platform and an associated list of providers.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将根据Ohai在厨师客户端运行开始时收集的配置数据来确定正确的提供者,然后将这些配置数据映射到平台和相关的提供者列表。这个配置数据然后被映射到一个平台和相关的供应商列表。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will look up the provider for the directory resource, which happens to be Chef::Provider::Directory, call load_current_resource to create a directory["/tmp/folder"] resource, and then, based on the current state of the directory, do the specified action, which in this case is to create a directory called /tmp/folder. If the directory already exists, nothing will happen. If the directory was changed in any way, the resource is marked as updated.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端将查找 directory 资源的提供者，该提供者恰好是 Chef::Provider::Directory ，调用 load_current_resource 创建一个 directory["/tmp/folder"] 资源，然后基于当前状态目录，请执行指定的操作，在这种情况下，将创建一个名为 /tmp/folder 的目录。如果目录已经存在，则不会发生任何事情。如果目录以任何方式更改，则该资源将标记为已更新。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will manage the permissions of the entire directory structure below /html, for a total of 12 files and 4 directories. For example:
trans-unit.target: Chef-client将管理 /html 下的整个目录结构的权限，总共12个文件和4个目录。例如：

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will only update the property values that require updates and will not make changes when the property values are already in the desired state
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端只会更新需要更新的属性值,当属性值已经处于所需的状态时,不会进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will pick up the _default run-list if env_run_list[environment_name] is null or nonexistent.
trans-unit.target: 如果 env_run_list[environment_name] 为null或不存在，则厨师客户将选择 _default 运行列表。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will pull down the node object from the Chef server (which contains the attribute data from the previous chef-client run), after which all attributes (except normal are reset)
trans-unit.target: Chef-Client将从Chef服务器中拉出节点对象（该节点对象包含来自先前Chef-Client运行的属性数据），然后所有属性（ normal 除外）将重置

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will rebuild the attribute list and apply attribute precedence while configuring the node
trans-unit.target: chef-client将重建属性列表,并在配置节点的同时应用属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will run a recipe only when asked. When the chef-client runs the same recipe more than once, the results will be the same system state each time. When a recipe is run against a system, but nothing has changed on either the system or in the recipe, the chef-client won’t change anything.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户仅在询问时才会运行食谱。当厨师客户多次运行相同的配方时，每次的结果将是相同的系统状态。当配方在系统上运行时，但在系统或配方中均未更改时，厨师客户将不会更改任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will update the cookbooks on the node (if required), which updates the attributes contained in attribute files and recipes
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将更新节点上的食谱(如果需要),从而更新属性文件和食谱中包含的属性。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client will update the role and environment data (if required)
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端将更新角色和环境数据(如果需要)。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client, by default, will attempt to execute a Homebrew command as the owner of /usr/local/bin/brew. If that executable does not exist, the chef-client will attempt to find the user by executing which brew. If that executable cannot be found, the chef-client will print an error message: Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path.. Use the homebrew_user attribute to specify the Homebrew owner for situations where the chef-client cannot automatically detect the correct owner.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，chef-client将尝试以 /usr/local/bin/brew 的所有者身份执行Homebrew命令。如果该可执行文件不存在，则厨师客户端将尝试通过执行 which brew 来查找用户。如果找不到该可执行文件，则厨师客户端将显示一条错误消息： Could not find the "brew" executable in /usr/local/bin or anywhere on the path. 。如果厨师客户端无法自动检测到正确的所有者，请使用 homebrew_user 属性指定“家庭酿造”所有者。

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo
trans-unit.target: 厨师-repo

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo contains several directories, each with a README file that describes what it is for and how to use that directory when managing systems.
trans-unit.target: chef-repo包含几个目录,每个目录都有一个README文件,描述了它的用途和管理系统时如何使用该目录。

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo directory should be synchronized with a version control system, such as git. All of the data in the chef-repo should be treated like source code.
The chef-repo is a directory on your workstation that stores everything you need to define your infrastructure with Chef Infra:
The chef-repo is located on a workstation and should be synchronized with a version control system, such as git. All of the data in the chef-repo should be treated like source code.
trans-unit.target: chef-repo位于工作站上,应该与版本控制系统同步,比如git。chef-repo中的所有数据都应该被视为源代码。

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo is the location in which the following data objects are stored:
trans-unit.target: chef-repo是存储以下数据对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo is the repository structure in which cookbooks are authored, tested, and maintained:
trans-unit.target: 厨师-repo是编写、测试和维护烹饪书的仓库结构。

trans-unit.source: The chef-repo should be synchronized with a version control system (such as git), and then managed as if it were source code
trans-unit.target: chef-repo应该与版本控制系统(如git)同步,然后像管理源代码一样管理它

trans-unit.source: The chef-server.rb file contains all of the non-default configuration settings used by the Chef server. (The default settings are built-in to the Chef server configuration and should only be added to the chef-server.rb file to apply non-default values.) These configuration settings are processed when the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command is run, such as immediately after setting up the Chef server or after making a change to the underlying configuration settings after the server has been deployed. The chef-server.rb file is a Ruby file, which means that conditional statements can be used in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Chef-server.rb文件包含Chef服务器使用的所有非默认配置设置。 （默认设置内置于Chef服务器配置中，应仅将其添加到chef-server.rb文件中以应用非默认值。）运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令时将处理这些配置设置。，例如在设置Chef服务器之后或在部署服务器后对基础配置设置进行更改之后。 Chef-server.rb文件是一个Ruby文件，这意味着可以在配置文件中使用条件语句。

trans-unit.source: The chef-server.rb file contains settings that can be used to edit the number of nodes that are under license:
trans-unit.target: chef-server.rb文件包含了一些设置,可以用来编辑许可证下的节点数量。

The config.rb configuration can include arbitrary Ruby code to extend configuration beyond static values. This can be used to load environmental variables from the workstation. This makes it possible to write a single config.rb file that can be used by all users within your organization. This single file can also be checked into your chef-repo, allowing users to load different config.rb files based on which chef-repo they execute the commands from. This can be especially useful when each chef-repo points to a different chef server or organization.

The allowed duration for this deadline is: For HTTP targets, between 15 seconds and 30 minutes, for App Engine HTTP targets, between 15 seconds and 24 hours. The default configuration of the Chef Infra Client assumes that it is run as the root user. This affords the Chef Infra Client the greatest flexibility when managing the state of any object. However, the Chef Infra Client may be run as a non-root user—i.e. “run as a user with limited system privileges”—which can be useful when the objects on the system are available to other user accounts.

The default configuration of the chef-client assumes that it is run as the root user. This affords the chef-client the greatest flexibility when managing the state of any object. However, the chef-client may be run as a non-root user—i.e. “run as a user with limited system privileges”—which can be useful when the objects on the system are available to other user accounts.

The default implementation extracts your tarball source file into HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH. The supported archive extensions on Linux are: .tar, .tar.bz2, .tar.gz, .tar.xz, .rar, .zip, .Z, .7z. Only .zip is supported on Windows. If the file archive could not be found or has an unsupported extension, then a message will be printed to stderr with additional information.

The default implementation is that the software specified in $pkg_source is downloaded, checksum-verified, and placed in $HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH/$pkg_filename, which resolves to a path like /hab/cache/src/filename.tar.gz. You should override this behavior if you need to change how your binary source is downloaded, if you are not downloading any source code at all, or if you are cloning from git. If you do clone a repo from git, you must override do_verify() to return 0.

The default implementation is to run make install on the source files and place the compiled binaries or libraries in HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH/$pkg_dirname, which resolves to a path like /hab/cache/src/packagename-version/. It uses this location because of do_build() using the --prefix option when calling the configure script.

The default implementation is to update the prefix path for the configure script to use $pkg_prefix and then run make to compile the downloaded source. This means the script in the default implementation does ./configure --prefix=$pkg_prefix && make.

The default implementation removes the HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH/$pkg_dirname folder in case there was a previously-built version of your package installed on disk. This ensures you start with a clean build environment.

The default implementation tries to verify the checksum specified in the plan against the computed checksum after downloading the source tarball to disk. If the specified checksum doesn’t match the computed checksum, then an error and a message specifying the mismatch will be printed to stderr. You should not need to override this behavior unless your package does not download any files.
The default is 6 if compression is true.

The default lifetime of all tables in the dataset, in milliseconds. The minimum value is 3600000 milliseconds (one hour). Once this property is set, all newly-created tables in the dataset will have an expirationTime property set to the creation time plus the value in this property, and changing the value will only affect new tables, not existing ones. When the expirationTime for a given table is reached, that table will be deleted automatically. If a table’s expirationTime is modified or removed before the table expires, or if you provide an explicit expirationTime when creating a table, that value takes precedence over the default expiration time indicated by this property.

The default partition expiration for all partitioned tables in the dataset, in milliseconds. Once this property is set, all newly-created partitioned tables in the dataset will have an expirationMs property in the timePartitioning settings set to this value, and changing the value will only affect new tables, not existing ones. The storage in a partition will have an expiration time of its partition time plus this value. Setting this property overrides the use of defaultTableExpirationMs for partitioned tables: only one of defaultTableExpirationMs and defaultPartitionExpirationMs will be used for any new partitioned table. If you provide an explicit timePartitioning.expirationMs when creating or updating a partitioned table, that value takes precedence over the default partition expiration time indicated by this property.

The directory you were in is now mounted as /src inside the Studio. By default, a Supervisor runs in the background for iterative testing. You can see the streaming output by running sup-log. If you terminate the background Supervisor, then running sup-run will restart it along with every service that was previously loaded. The distinguished name used to bind to the LDAP server. The user the Chef Infra Server will use to perform LDAP searches. This is often the administrator or manager user. This user needs to have read access to all LDAP users that require authentication. The Chef Infra Server must do an LDAP search before any user can log in. Many Active Directory and LDAP systems do not allow an anonymous bind. If anonymous bind is allowed, leave the bind_dn and bind_password settings blank. If anonymous bind is not allowed, a user with READ access to the directory is required. This user must be specified as an LDAP distinguished name similar to:

The distinguished name used to bind to the LDAP server. The user the Chef server will use to perform LDAP searches. This is often the administrator or manager user. Many Active Directory and LDAP systems do not allow an anonymous bind. If anonymous bind is allowed, leave the bind_dn and bind_password settings blank. The first thing it will do is attempt to promote itself to DRBD primary, which will fail if the disk has been written to at all while this host was down, and Keepalived will be unable to transition back to the original master. The folder’s display name. A folder’s display name must be unique amongst its siblings, e.g. no two folders with the same parent can share the same display name. The display name must start and end with a letter or digit, may contain letters, digits, spaces, hyphens and underscores and can be no longer than 30 characters. This is captured by the regular expression: [\p{L}\p{N}]([\p{L}\p{N}_- ]{0,28}[\p{L}\p{N}])?.

The disk values listed below should be a good default value that you will want to modify later if/when your node count grows.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use only_if with one (or more) cookbook attributes to ensure that packages are only installed when necessary. In this case, three attributes exist in the /attributes/default.rb file: use_openssl, use_pcre, and use_zlib. Each of these attributes are defined as false by default. The only_if attributes are used to test for the presence of these packages on the target node before then asking Chef Infra Client to complete the process of installing these packages. If the packages are already present, Chef Infra Client will do nothing.

The following example shows how to use only_if with one (or more) cookbook attributes to ensure that packages are only installed when necessary. In this case, three attributes exist in the /attributes/default.rb file: use_openssl, use_pcre, and use_zlib. Each of these attributes are defined as false by default. The only_if attributes are used to test for the presence of these packages on the target node before then asking the chef-client to complete the process of installing these packages. If the packages are already present, the chef-client will do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明如何将 only_if 与一个（或多个）食谱属性一起使用，以确保仅在必要时安装软件包。在这种情况下，/attributes/ /attributes/default.rb 文件中存在三个属性： use_openssl ， use_pcre 和 use_zlib 。这些属性中的每一个在默认情况下都定义为 false 。该 only_if 属性然后问厨师的客户端来完成这些安装包的过程之前，用于测试目标节点上的这些包的存在。如果软件包已经存在，则厨师客户将不执行任何操作。
